weekly picks (Oct 2 week 2024)

Posted on October 14, 2024 in 2024oct,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Oct 2nd week collection

  1. acsami.4c12665 Abnormal Relaxation Behavior of Excited Electrons in the Flat Band of Kagome Compound Nb3Cl8 (ACS Applied Materials & Interfaces)

  2. 2410.07878 Flat-band (de)localization emulated with a superconducting qubit array (arXiv)

  3. 2410.07894 Site-selective correlations in interacting “flat-band” quasicrystals (arXiv)

  4. 2410.06147 Persistent flat band splitting and strong selective band renormalization in a kagome magnet thin film (arXiv)

  5. 2410.07000 Classification of Higher-Order Van Hove Singularities in Kagome Topological Bands (arXiv)

  6. 2410.05765 Magnon confinement in a nanomagnonic waveguide by a magnetic Moire superlattice (arXiv)

  7. 2410.05418 Macroscopic degeneracy of ground state in the frustrated Heisenberg diamond chain (arXiv)

  8. 2410.05957 Unified model for non-Abelian braiding of Majorana and Dirac fermion zero modes (arXiv)

  9. symmetry 2073-8994/16/10/1336 Spin Wave Chiral Scattering by Skyrmion Lattice in Ferromagnetic Nanotubes (Symmetry)

  10. abstract=1744 Current-induced dynamics of magnetic hedgehog lattices (ICM2024)

  11. 2410.05485 Slow Equilibrium Relaxation in a Chiral Magnet Mediated by Topological Defects (arXiv)

  12. 3315967 Observation of Néel-type magnetic skyrmion in a layered non-centrosymmetric itinerant ferromagnet CrTe1.38 (APL)

  13. PhysRevB.110.144505 Coherence length and quantum geometry in a dilute flat-band superconductor (PRB)

  14. 2410.04515 Topological flat bands and higher-order topology in square-octagon lattice (arXiv)

  15. 2410.01142 Isolated zero-energy flat-bands and intrinsic magnetism in carbon monolayers (arXiv)

  16. 3314953 Skyrmion dynamics in attractive and repulsive local magnetic fields (JAP)

  17. 2410.00820 Topological orbital Hall effect caused by skyrmions and antiferromagnetic skyrmions (Mertig, arXiv)

  18. 2409.19879 Magnetoelectric imprint of skyrmions in van der Waals bilayers (arXiv)

  19. 2409.19086 Majorana edge and end states in planar Josephson junctions (arXiv)

  20. advs.202407982 Engineering Topological Spin Hall Effect in 2D Multiferroic Material (Advanced Science)
